text1: The Froskur-class frigate is a general-purpose combat platform fielded regularly by Boundless patrols. It is relatively bulky, outfitted with strong armor and a flexible weapon loadout. The frigate's base speed and maneuverability leave much to be desired, but it is capable of rapidly adjusting its position via powerful auxiliary thrusters.
Briefly (and massively) boosts speed in the current direction of travel.
